title: Elder care coordination with spouse for mother-in-law
description: Elder care coordination with spouse for mother-in-law
content:
Scenario: Elder care coordination with spouse for mother-in-law
    Given Frank and his wife help maintain Frank's mother-in-law's home
    And they provide transportation and advocacy support
    And elder care is substantial and skilled labor
    When family_elohim tracks elder care contributions
    Then Frank's home maintenance support should be recognized
    And transportation and medical advocacy should be valued
    And his construction skills applied to elder care should be quantified
    And care burden should be monitored for sustainability
    And family should see Frank's elder care contributions
    And his care work should accumulate family care tokens
